rgraph

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • rgraph.Graph
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModuleGraph, UnitGraph

    public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Graph represents a relational network between modular robots.

    A Modular robot graph has state containing a nodelist and an edgelist Nodes must subclass the Node abstract class and edges must do the same for the edge class.

      Constructs a graph with a set of vertices and edges.

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(Node n1,
                    Node n2,
                    int dir)
        Default edge constructor, adds a contracted edge.
        Parameters:
        n1 - Start node
        n2 - End node
        dir - direction from start node to end node to add the edge

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(Node n1,
                    Node n2,
                    int dir,
                    boolean isExtended)
        Edge constructor, adds an edge given extension between the nodes.
        Parameters:
        n1 - Start node
        n2 - End node
        dir - direction from start node to end node to add the edge
        isExtended - true if edge added is 1 unit long

      • removeEdge

        public void removeEdge(Node n1,
                       Node n2)
        Removes the edge between two nodes.
        Parameters:
        n1 - one node in the edge
        n2 - other node in the edge

      • removeEdge

        public void removeEdge(Node n,
                       int dir)
        Removes the edge from a node in a given direction.
        Parameters:
        n - the reference node who owns the edge
        dir - the direction of the edge relative to the reference node to remove

      • toGrid

        public Grid toGrid()

      • toGrid

        public Grid toGrid(boolean includeEdges)
        Transform a graph into a Grid (Cartesian space).
        Parameters:
        includeEdges - if true, then grid includes unit length edges in representation otherwise edges are ignored.
        Returns:
        The Cartesian respresentation of a Graph
